Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.

Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.
An item name, a cybernetic implant that can enhance players' abilities
A nano-machine injection device created by TaiXing Cybernetics, providing unparalleled upgrades to cybernetic abilities. Inject into the neck for enhanced performance.
EuroDollar is a widely accepted currency in the continent, used for everyday purchases and transactions.
EuroDollar is a widely accepted currency in the continent, used for everyday purchases and transactions.
NetCoin is a digital currency mainly used in black market transactions. It is untraceable and can be used to purchase illegal goods and services.

An item name used to repair broken equipment

The Nano Repairer is a state-of-the-art device developed by TaiXing Cybernetics for repairing a wide range of equipment intelligently with nano-machines. It's your go-to solution when your gear malfunctions due to calibration failure. Keep in mind, it doesn't guarantee a fix every time, but persistence pays off, after a few attempts, it'll get the job done.
